channel.title: fit on Eigh-Ba IBD
channel.description: Recent content in fit on Eigh-Ba IBD

item.title: Unlocking New Markets
item.description: Foreign market expansion provides opportunities for growth and profit but involves risks. Engaging in long-term collaborations with local companies helps to overcome these challenges, complementing sales channels and unlocking inaccessible markets.

item.title: Finding the Perfect Partnership
item.description: To succeed in distant markets, evaluate potential partnerships through clear goal definition, thorough research, cultural fit assessment, effective communication, reference checks, negotiation, and local expert collaboration, ensuring productivity and mutual benefits for all parties.

item.title: CQ - Why is essential for success
item.description: CQ - Why is essential for success In today’s globalized economy, businesses are increasingly seeking to expand their operations and enter new markets. However, cross-border business partnerships can be challenging due to cultural differences that can impact communication, negotiation, and decision-making. That’s why cultural intelligence is essential for successful cross-border business partnerships.
